sentences: Mutsuyoshi Nishimura drew attention to Japans new plan to implement its Kyoto commitments, describing it as a 'huge package' of measures involving various stakeholders.

Stressing that climate change is real and that delays in dealing with it will lead to further damage, he highlighted technological innovation, on which Japan has taken a leading role, and also advocated global action.
He supported a free and frank dialogue and a 'new paradigm' that was 'encouraging and enabling' rather than 'capping and punishing.
' He supported a roadmap to a low carbon society.
